name: Hang In There (Vespid)
description:
This is just a short physics platformer I made for a school project. I have no idea how long it will stay active with how Contruct 3 works. 

Average completion time for first time players is around 1 hour. There have been speedruns as fast as 32 seconds. 

Please enjoy and provide feedback! It's still "in development" so there are some minor bugs I am aware of, but nothing that makes an impact on gameplay. 

Thanks!

Andrew
